solution_line_template: He lost {initial_bench_press}*{loss_percent}=<<{initial_bench_press}*{loss_percent}={weight_lost}>>{weight_lost} pounds from his bench
So his bench went to {initial_bench_press}-{weight_lost}=<<{initial_bench_press}-{weight_lost}={bench_after_injury}>>{bench_after_injury} pounds
